__e: This box represents a trail of slain dudes that has kind of made me the woman that I am today.
Man, when did feelings become the most important thing in the world?
Well, I may have met him sometime, somewhere. When I used to like to meet people. Before they all seemed to become the same person over and over again, and I tired of that person.

I can't remember her name, and she starts telling him... the story of her life and how she has to hustle guys in the bar... to buy her champagne because she gets paid by the cork... and somehow they become friends.
One could almost say that you became the best of friends.
When did the two of them become good friends?
The only thing they have in common is that their lives have become a living hell because of it.
They've made him one of them in a way, but it's not who he really is.
I see things between you and my brother have gotten a little personal.
Did things turn out for the best?
The evil he did made them what they are, and they hunger.
Ever since, they have become a part of my life.
Fine, but know this. These people have become like family to me... and I protect my family.
She's been loved by everyone here. I mean, you really have become another family for her.
It's clear that they've become stronger, smarter.
You became more than friends, yes or no?
The entire population becomes young again overnight.
